os.description: Additional packages and commands to run prior to terraform execution

packages.description: list of apk packages to install at container execution time

commands.description: List of shell commands to run after packages are installed but before Terrafrom executes

workspace.description: The name of the Terraform workspace to run (defaults to 'default')

credentials.description: Relay secret containing the credentials.json for accessing GCP

accessKeyID.description: Access Key ID for the AWS account

secretAccessKey.description: The secret key for the AWS account

directory.description: Subdirectory of the git repository containing the Terraform config root

vars.description: A map of variables to set as tfvars

backendConfig.description: A map of backend configuration variables to be passed to terraform as -backend-config=key=value

git.description: A git repository containing the terraform code to run

ssh_key.description: The SSH key to use when cloning the git repository. You can pass the key  into Relay as a secret.

known_hosts.description: SSH known hosts file. Pass the contents of the file into Relay as a secr et.

name.description: A directory name for the git clone
